mapper.update:
update STORE_ZHUANGCHECKD
DANJUBH = #{danjubh,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CHUKULX = #{chukulx,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
YEWUY = #{yewuy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BUMEN = #{bumen,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
KEHUBM = #{kehubm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
KEHUJC = #{kehujc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
KEHUQC = #{kehuqc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FAHUOCK = #{fahuock,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FAHUODZ = #{fahuodz,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CHENGYUNDW = #{chengyundw,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SHIFOUFY = #{shifoufy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SHIFOUPC = #{shifoupc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
JIHUAFHKSSJ = #{jihuafhkssj,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
JIHUAFHJSSJ = #{jihuafhjssj,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CHEXING = #{chexing,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TIJI = #{tiji,jdbcType=INTEGER},
CHEPAIH = #{chepaih,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SHIJILXDH = #{shijilxdh,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
GONGLI = #{gongli,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
YUNJIA = #{yunjia,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
GONGSHICDBL = #{gongshicdbl,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
YUNFEI = #{yunfei,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
FAHUOFS = #{fahuofs,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where BIANHAO = #{bianhao,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update STORE_ZHUANGCHECKD set DANJUBH = #{danjubh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CHUKULX = #{chukulx,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, YEWUY = #{yewuy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BUMEN = #{bumen,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, KEHUBM = #{kehubm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, KEHUJC = #{kehujc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, KEHUQC = #{kehuqc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FAHUOCK = #{fahuock,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FAHUODZ = #{fahuodz,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CHENGYUNDW = #{chengyundw,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SHIFOUFY = #{shifoufy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SHIFOUPC = #{shifoupc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, JIHUAFHKSSJ = #{jihuafhkssj,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, JIHUAFHJSSJ = #{jihuafhjssj,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CHEXING = #{chexing,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TIJI = #{tiji,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CHEPAIH = #{chepaih,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SHIJILXDH = #{shijilxdh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, GONGLI = #{gongli,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, YUNJIA = #{yunjia,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, GONGSHICDBL = #{gongshicdbl,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, YUNFEI = #{yunfei,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, FAHUOFS = #{fahuofs,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where BIANHAO = #{bianhao,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.sql: BIANHAO, sc.DANJUBH, CHUKULX, YEWUY, BUMEN, KEHUBM, KEHUJC, KEHUQC, FAHUOCK, FAHUODZ, CHENGYUNDW, SHIFOUFY, SHIFOUPC, JIHUAFHKSSJ, JIHUAFHJSSJ, CHEXING, TIJI, CHEPAIH, SHIJILXDH, GONGLI, YUNJIA, GONGSHICDBL, YUNFEI, FAHUOFS
mapper.select:
select
, sk.DANJURQ danjurq,sk.BEIZHU beizhu,sk.SHENHER shenher,sk.SHENHESJ shenhesj,(CASE sk.SHENHEBJ WHEN 0 THEN '未审核' WHEN 1 THEN '通过' WHEN 2 THEN '不通过' END) shenhebj, sk.FANSHENR fanshenr,sk.FANSHENSJ fanshensj,sk.RUKULX rukulx,sk.ZHUANHUAZT zhuanhuazt,sk.KUDANLX kudanlx from STORE_ZHUANGCHECKD sc left join STORE_KUDAN sk on sc.DANJUBH = sk.DANJUBH
where 1=1
and sc.danjubh like concat(concat('%',#{danjubh}),'%')
and sc.chepaih like concat(concat('%',#{chepaih}),'%')
and sc.chexing like concat(concat('%',#{chexing}),'%')
and sc.kehuqc like concat(concat('%',#{kehuqc}),'%')
order by sk.DANJURQ desc
